phrases: <Episode 7 The Doll Sings to the Dancing Snow...>
They were all prepared by Professor Pavlichenko to hide the existence of his son,
and to escape in case of an emergency.
There are also traces of tampering in the family registry.
And not only once, but twice...
Why would he go that far to hide his son?
Perhaps it is related to his research that he is been secretly conducting.
You mean that ME network drivel mentioned in the report?
If that was feasible, we would both be jobless.
It was the case with Professor Pavlichenko's corpse, too.
The DNA proves that the body was indeed his.
But the ME squeezer was only able to extract a day's worth of memories.
We got this a moment ago.
It is from an SVR agent in Japan.
Kumo o koe boku ni todoke
Susumu beki michi o terashite yo
Illuminate the road that I must advance on
Kyou ga donna ni kowaresou de mo
No matter how broken today looks
That they'feel it is good enough
Sore de ii to omoeru tte
if they are if happy today'
But that is also a distant memory
The time that is simply passing by-
Kore kara saki dou naru no darou?
Kumo o koe boku ni todoke
Susumu beki michi o terashite yo
Illuminate the road that I must advance on
Kyou ga donna ni kowaresou de mo
No matter how broken today looks
I thought you would be in the archives,
yet you are here in this creepy place.
Oh, was not this place the hive of the dolls?
At least you were discrete enough not to call your friend.
The lines are obviously tapped, and would cause that person a lot of trouble.
And you might be able to notice now that
You are lucky there are not any power lines here, though.
We took all the know-how after the astronomy division was closed.
And now we have got Izanami.
Why are you telling me this?
We are in the same boat.
A grunt like me will not be informed of anything important.
I want to know what the higher-ups are thinking.
Want To partner up with me?
Not only do you have the Japanese Public Safety on your ass,
but the CIA which you betrayed and the Russian organization, too.
It will not be easy to get out of Hokkaido.
They will help if we pay them.
It is the same with an informant.
We do business if we both have common goals.
That is not a nice way to greet people!
If they are checking this place too, I do not think there is another way out of Hokkaido.
I am pretty sure they have covered every path.
We will have to think this thoroughly before we get to Hakodate.
That has its price too, of course.
There were some deviations in the plan, but we have managed to get Izanami.
If I am not mistaken, they tried to kill Izanami, right?
We are still investigating who is behind this and where the information was leaked.
Is it true that Izanami's father is here?
You have already heard about that.
You have got to drink it all.
So far, we have only received information that we found a matching person.
We are still investigating that matter.
The time stated in the Mitaka documents is not that far in the future.
Okay, I will contact you again when I get it.
We will meet at the usual place, okay?
It will boost up your manliness.
Now we just need a photo to plaster on this.
I see you rented another strange car again.
Dolls are unexpectedly easy to distinguish.
The blizzard is still at it.
I cannot believe I am stuck here in Sapporo because of a blizzard.
I do not care if it is a car or a train, just get me to Tokyo immediately.
The bullet train is not working either.
Perhaps you should take an express train?
Though, there is no need to rush.
The people out there do not give shit about anything.
Is this little lady a contractor?
We use the contractors that are trained in your organization.
You are not from the consulate?
Have you heard about that incident in Sapporo?
Not even which organizations were involved.
According to our investigations, we believe a Japanese agency is involved in that incident.
But we have received this from an eyewitness.
We believe it is the doll and the girl that were mentioned in the report.
We can most likely find our target if we watch them.
We have got a skilled contractor to mark them.
I think you have heard of her.
I do not want to hear that name.
So much that he sickens me.
When you speak of the devil...
We just got information regarding a smuggling route for dolls.
Is not eating that ice cream making you cold?
You just wolfed down all those dishes earlier.
He met with an unfortunate accident while he was on a trip to Aomori by himself.
His father and sister are in the car behind me.
Can I take a look in the coffin?
As promised, I have taken you to Sendai.
You will board the Cassiopeia at 04:30.
I think they will not be thoroughly monitoring at that time.
If you are worried you can switch trains at the local station.
Can we take July out for now?
There will be inspections at Aomori too,
so it will be a hassle to get him back in there.
Are not you lonely being alone in this coffin?
You should speak up if something is bothering you.
They are in the doll business.
So she was after July from the start.
Should not we chase after them?
I need him when I use my powers.
It is a waste of time.
I do not want you to use your powers.
Why are you so cold toward July?
But in Yin's case, you acted so...
With your powers gone, you will need her-
Besides, we do not know where they are headed.
Damn, I cannot take my eyes off of you for a second!
Episode 7 The Doll Sings to the Dancing Snow
I was teasing July a bit earlier.
But I could not really tell how he felt.
That is because he is a doll.
Otherwise he would not have sent that surveillance spirit.
I am sure the fragments of our hearts will not disappear.
Regardless of if we are dolls or contractors...
Mao, we will get off at the next stop.
We will get onto another car.
They will take good care of you.
Little boys as dolls are pretty popular.
We can get in from there.
Hey, are not you the professional here?
Almost anything can be used as a weapon.
What the hell is he doing?
I have got to get her away from him.
Can you do that by making some noise?
Yes, but are you planning to go in with that?
If I use my rifle, the police could come.
It is dangerous if some amateurs try to deal with dolls.
Every country wants a skilled doll,
so doll smugglers are always in touch with intelligence agencies.
It is like an opiate for the brain.
Your pain fades away; you feel sleepy.
I have been looking for you!
So you are a contractor as well.
Is this squirrel a contractor too?
Those who are killed by me are lucky.
They die dreaming of something pleasant.
How long has it been since you have stopped dreaming?
I am asking you how long you have been a contractor.
You are still not aware of all this?
I am really saved by not being able to dream.
I used to often dream of the women I killed.
I murdered them in atrocious ways.
The complete opposite of how I am killing now.
Hearing that from an animal is funny.
But now it is all pointless...
Or better said I have stopped killing them in an irrational way.
I cannot do it anymore, because I have become a contractor.
Was not that a bad idea?
If you want to thank someone, thank July.
My back is pressed by the darkening glow of dusk
Arukidasu kage ga shimesu hou e
I start walking toward where my shadow points
Taenai ikutsu mo no deai to wakare o
Repeating the many, ceaseless encounters and partings
Kurikaeshi doko e mukau no ka
For all people, while they are lost,
tsumi to iu na no sadame o seotte
they bear the fate known as sin
Sore de mo nao ikiru imi o shiru darou
Nevertheless, I will still learn of the meaning to live, right?
Bokura wa sou Day by Day
That is right, Day by Day,
ashita e tsuzuku michi no tochuu de
we are midway on the road leading to tomorrow
Now Say It Again kimi to futari no mama
Now Say It Again, though it would be great if
irareta nara ii no ni naa...
I could remain together with you...
For hunting, you have to get to the spot early to camp.
I will not forget the glitter of that summer day.
The sunlight making its way into the room through the window...
The spray of water trickling down your blond hair...
The echoes through the cold wall.
And then... we cannot go back to that day.
